title: CryptoInsightLounge
author: CryptoInsightLounge
content: Hey Bitcointalk community,üöÄ Ready to embark on a journey to financial freedom through crypto? Look no further! We've created a dynamic Telegram group dedicated to helping you navigate the crypto space with insider information, potential token gems, and free resources to enhance your crypto knowledge.üî• What We Offer:Insider Information: Gain access to exclusive insights and early alerts about upcoming tokens with massive potential.Token Discoveries: Don't miss out on the next big thing! We share handpicked tokens poised for significant growth.Educational Support: Whether you're a seasoned trader or a crypto newbie, our group provides a supportive environment to enhance your understanding of the crypto market.üí° Why Join Us?No hidden fees or subscription charges ‚Äì everything is absolutely FREE!Connect with a community of like-minded individuals passionate about crypto success.Empower yourself with the knowledge to make informed decisions in the fast-paced world of cryptocurrencies.üåê How to Join:Simply click https://t.me/cryptoinsightlounge and become part of a community committed to achieving financial freedom through crypto.üöÄ Ready to transform your crypto journey? Join us now and elevate your understanding of the crypto universe!https://t.me/cryptoinsightlounge

comments.author: Vod
comments.body: Should be moved to Project Development.In projects like this, the value comes in the experience of the people running it.¬† ¬†If they are on your site, they could miss out on the next big opportunity announced on another site.You should list your credentials - education, experience, etc.¬† ¬†If you want to remain anonymous, be advised there are a million sites like yours.

comments.author: franky1
comments.body: pump and dump telegram group.. [yawn] moving on

comments.author: kotajikikox
comments.body: Account freshly created , Posting thread like this sharing link to their social media account of their Site and yes not coming back to clear or answer things.and sorry but what 1000x? not sure if there are even one that can prove them knowing what coin or project that will go x100 that easy and accurate .

comments.author: franky1
comments.body: Quote from: kotajikikox on December 05, 2023, 11:27:36 AMand sorry but what 1000x? not sure if there are even one that can prove them knowing what coin or project that will go x100 that easy and accurate its a pump and dump groupif they can recuir enough idiots and promise them a 1000x.. the naive traders will buy and pump to 500x thinking they are outsmarting the system by not buying all the way to the top.. but the organiser never truly beleived it would get to 1000x, and so selles at just 80x thanks to the pumpersthe pumpers are then left buying upto 500x buy selling between each other. leaving one bag holder at the top buying everyones sells below him.. and yep he is left holding a bag of tokens that will never reach 500x again so has to sell at a lower cost = lossmeanwhile the organiser that promised 1000x exited at a healthy 80xand thats how the game is played.. scammers that want 8x will promote 100x thinking recruited idiots will atleast pump 10-50x thinking they are smart
